column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////If you are looking for some ramen in downtown Houston
column2: this is the place to go for quick friendly service and tasty food! Atmosphere is very casual
column3: loud and friendly. There are multiple options for sitting
column4: such as in separate booths/tables or in a big table shared with other parties. Staff has always been helpful and great customer service. They will not seat you unless your whole party is there so come prepared! Free parking garage next to the restaurants.
